description:
Fabio Pliger/Marc-André Lemburg - EPS General Assembly
[EuroPython 2016]
[21 July 2016]
[Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain]
(https://ep2016.europython.eu//conference/talks/eps-general-assembly)

This is where the EuroPython Society (EPS) board gives its reports,
resolutions are passed and the EPS members can vote in a new EPS
board.
title: EPS General Assembly
